Tavatron sighed, she wanted so much to help Dinobot, to be there for him. 
But that wasn't what he wanted, or needed, right now. She grabbed some food 
cubes and headed for the bridge, eating along the way, not bothering to 
actually sit and enjoy her meal.

She finished the last of her food as she heard Liono's transmission:

"Well, I'm already at base, may as well make myself useful." Tavatron sat 
down at one of the scanners.

"Computer, scan for known and unknown Predacon signatures." With all the new 
'bots showing up lately you couldn't be too careful. As the computer scanned 
Tavatron leaned back, and thought of something a friend had said to her a 
long time ago:

*A 'bot that's cold to the world and herself is no 'bot at all, but a 'bot 
that's willing to face her demons, and fight them to the bitter end, now 
that 'bot I'm proud to call my friend.*
